description: This file defines a helper class 'PropsHelper' for managing CPE (Customer Premises Equipment) properties, including getting, setting, and deleting properties, with support for different data types and error handling.

classes.name: PropsHelper
classes.description: Helper class to streamline interactions with CPE properties, including retrieval, type conversion, and modification actions.

methods.name: getCpeProperty
methods.description: Fetches a CPE property value by key, returning a default if not found.

methods.name: getCpeIntProperty
methods.description: Retrieves an integer CPE property, with fallback to default on error.

methods.name: getCpeBoolProperty
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean CPE property, with fallback to default on error.

methods.name: setCpeProperty
methods.description: Sets a CPE property with a specified key, value, and source.
